pos_mean_info_list.mean: 令人鼓舞的；鼓励的，奖励的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指提高某人情绪，增强战胜困难，实现目标的信心和勇气。
主要指某人的言行或其它外界因素使他人变得兴奋或感情冲动，多用被动态。
尤指人或物因外界因素而受到刺激，使人振作起来或增强做某事的信心和勇气。
通常指鼓起勇气，充满信心和希望。

bilingual.source: I'll encourage her to join in more.
Teachers can encourage movement with ideas like these.
bilingual.target: 老师可以用这些方法来鼓励活动。

bilingual.source: They try to encourage students to use it responsibly.
bilingual.target: 他们试图鼓励学生负责任地使用它。

bilingual.source: I can encourage others to develop healthy eating habits.
bilingual.target: 我可以鼓励别人养成健康的饮食习惯。

bilingual.source: Ryan's experience led him to encourage more people to help.
bilingual.target: 瑞安的经历使他鼓励更多的人来帮助。

bilingual.source: These stars encourage young people to work hard to achieve their dreams.
bilingual.target: 这些明星鼓励年轻人努力实现他们的梦想。

bilingual.source: Alistair says that they encourage each other as much as they can when they train.
bilingual.target: 阿利斯泰尔说他们在训练时尽可能互相鼓励。

bilingual.source: Look at these questions and say if you think they will encourage a short or a long answer.
bilingual.target: 看看这些问题，判断它们会鼓励简短还是详细的回答。

bilingual.source: If you encourage students to express their thoughts, they will learn to become thinkers.
bilingual.target: 如果你鼓励学生表达他们的想法，他们将学会成为思考者。

list.abstract: encourage（英 [ɪnˈkʌrɪdʒ]，美 [ɪnˈkɜːrɪdʒ]），英语单词，作动词为激励；鼓舞；鼓励；支持；激发；促进；助长。例句：Encourage their children to retell the story.（鼓励他们的孩子复述故事。） 近义词有heart，反义词有discourage。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. Why not? 'Cause I don't want to encourage this kind of behavior.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道。为什么？我不想鼓励这种行为。

yingyinNormal.en: With corporate profits at near record highs, we should encourage corporations to invest more in research and development and the salaries of their employees.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当前企业的利润创出新高，我们应该鼓励企业在研发上加大投入，提高员工工资。

yingyinNormal.en: I think we need to encourage foreign investment and develop new forms of economic growth rather than make one of the world's poorest countries even poorer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为我们应该鼓励外国资本进入发展新的经济增长模式，而不是让刚果一穷到底。
我希望你忍耐和克制一下。

yingyinNormal.en: I was thinking maybe an organization to encourage literacy. Good. Good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许可以捐给一个提倡扫除文盲的组织。很好，很好。

yingyinNormal.en: My mother didn't allow me to watch it. She was afraid it might encourage me to join a gang.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我妈妈不让我看，她担心我看了会加入黑帮。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't encourage this, all right? Okay. We're getting no help from Flash Gordon here. Flash Gordon? By the way, that's a compliment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别打岔，好不好？好。这位飞侠哥顿帮不上我们什么。《飞侠哥顿》？那可是在夸我哦。

yingyinNormal.en: So most economists believe that while too much of either is dangerous, a small, consistent amount of inflation is necessary to encourage economic growth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以经济学家大多认为，两种情形太严重都很危险，不过适度稳定的通膨，对于刺激经济成长却是必要的。

yingyinNormal.en: So most economists believe that while too much of either is dangerous, a small, consistent amount of inflation is necessary to encourage economic growth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以经济学家大多认为，两种情形太严重都很危险，不过适度稳定的通膨，对于刺激经济成长却是必要的。

yingyinNormal.en: But I want to encourage every one of you who has supported me to join me in supporting this extraordinary woman, the First Lady of the United States, Claire Hale Underwood.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我想让支持我的各位和我一起支持这位非凡的女性，美国第一夫人，克莱尔·黑尔·安德伍德。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, my youngest is not 16. But I think it would be hard on younger sisters not to have their share of amusement because the elder is still unmarried. It would hardly encourage sisterly affection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，最小的还没到16岁，如果年少的妹妹因为年长的姐姐没有结婚而不能进行社交活动，这一点都不会增进姐妹感情。

yingyinNormal.en: So, while this would stimulate business, it would also encourage over consumption, or hoarding commodities, like food and fuel, raising their prices and leading to consumer shortages and even more inflation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这虽然能刺激商业活动，但也会造成过度消费或大量囤货，例如食物和燃料，使得价格攀升，导致供不应求，通膨更加恶化。

yingyinNormal.en: So, while this would stimulate business, it would also encourage over consumption, or hoarding commodities, like food and fuel, raising their prices and leading to consumer shortages and even more inflation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这虽然能刺激商业活动，但也会造成过度消费或大量囤货，例如食物和燃料，使得价格攀升，导致供不应求，通膨更加恶化。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 鼓励的；令人鼓舞的；促进的；奖励的；赞助的
adj. 受到鼓舞的；信心倍增的

word_family.mean: v. 激励；鼓舞；鼓励；支持；激发；促进；助长

sense_info_list.en: give support, confidence or hope to; help or stimulate an activity, state, or view to develop

examination_example.sentence: The problem is not merely that people do bad science, but that our current system of career advancement positively <highlight>encourages</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问题不仅仅是人们做了不好的科学研究，而是我们目前的职业发展体系积极鼓励这种研究。

examination_example.sentence: Much more could be done to <highlight>encourage</highlight> "long-termism," such as changes in the tax code and quicker disclosure of stock acquisitions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了鼓励“长期主义”，我们还可以做更多的事情，比如修改税法，加快股票收购的披露。

examination_example.sentence: Congress has always envisioned joint federal-state immigration enforcement and explicitly <highlight>encourages</highlight> state officers to share information and cooperate with federal colleagues.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国会一直设想联邦-州联合移民执法，并明确鼓励州官员分享信息并与联邦同事合作。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 激励；鼓舞；鼓励；支持；激发；促进；助长

sense_info_list.en: give support, confidence or hope to

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>encourages</highlight> creation and innovation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它鼓励创造和创新。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>encourages</highlight> people to imitate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它鼓励人们模仿。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>encourage</highlight> extracurricular activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们鼓励课外活动。

examination_example.sentence: The results highlight the need to develop effective early interventions for educators to <highlight>encourage</highlight> positive peer relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些结果突显了形成有效的早期干预措施的必要性，以让教育工作者鼓励积极的同伴关系。

examination_example.sentence: If your goal is to improve your thinking, she recommends picking clothes that fit well and are unlikely to <highlight>encourage</highlight> restlessness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你的目标是改善你的思维，她建议你选择非常合身且不太可能引得人坐立不安的衣服。

examination_example.sentence: Often a manager's superiors can effectively <highlight>encourage</highlight> a manager's distasteful behavior when they fail to discipline the person's wrongdoings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常情况下，当管理者的上级未能对其不当行为进行惩戒时，他们会有效地鼓励管理者做出令人不快的行为。

word_usage.usage: encourage作动词，表示“鼓励”，“鼓励某人做某事”用“encourage sb. to do sth.”，没有“encourage sb. doing sth.”的用法，“encourage doing sth.”表示“鼓励做某事”。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指提高某人情绪, 增强战胜困难, 实现目标的信心和勇气。
主要指某人的言行或其它外界因素使他人变得兴奋或感情冲动, 多用被动态。
通常指鼓起勇气, 充满信心和希望。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 激励；鼓舞；鼓励；支持；激发；促进；助长

sense_info_list.en: give support; confidence or hope to

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Encourage</highlight> them to make things with hands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鼓励他们用手制作东西。

examination_example.sentence: Even those short of time or money should be <highlight>encouraged</highlight> to cook for themselves and their family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也要鼓励那些即便是没有时间或缺钱的人为自己和家人做饭。

examination_example.sentence: My mission is to <highlight>encourage</highlight> green hands and those lacking time or money to feed themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的任务是鼓励新手和那些缺乏时间或金钱的人养活自己。

sense_info_list.en: help or stimulate an activity; state; or view to develop

examination_example.sentence: Joe's parents decided to <highlight>encourage</highlight> his creativity by sending their son to an after-school art class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔的父母决定促进他的创造力，送他们的儿子去上课外美术课。

examination_example.sentence: This is where they conduct business, where success is rewarded with good reviews that <highlight>encourage</highlight> more business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是他们开展业务的地方，在这里，成功的回报是良好的评价，而这些评价促进更多的业务。

examination_example.sentence: What has <highlight>encouraged</highlight> forest growth historically?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从历史上看，是什么促进了森林的增长？

word_usage.usage: encourage作动词，表示“鼓励”，“鼓励某人做某事”用“encourage sb. to do sth.”，没有“encourage sb. doing sth.”的用法，“encourage doing sth.”表示“鼓励做某事”。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指提高某人情绪，增强战胜困难，实现目标的信心和勇气。
主要指某人的言行或其它外界因素使他人变得兴奋或感情冲动，多用被动态。
通常指鼓起勇气，充满信心和希望。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 鼓励的；令人鼓舞的；促进的；奖励的；赞助的

word_family.mean: v. 激励；鼓舞；鼓励；支持；激发；促进；助长

sense_info_list.en: give support, confidence or hope to

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>encourages</highlight> face-to-face interactions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它鼓励面对面的互动。

examination_example.sentence: Students are <highlight>encouraged</highlight> to take control of their own learning, rather than just depending on the teacher.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生被鼓励掌握自我学习，而不仅仅是依赖老师。

examination_example.sentence: I found the pre-holidays a good time to <highlight>encourage</highlight> young children to donate less-used things, and it worked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现假期前是鼓励孩子们捐赠不常用物品的好时机，而且效果很好。

examination_example.sentence: Likewise, river time and other timekeeping systems we're developing may <highlight>encourage</highlight> environmental awareness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样，我们正在开发的河流时间和其他计时系统可能会鼓励环保意识。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指提高某人情绪，增强战胜困难，实现目标的信心和勇气。
主要指某人的言行或其它外界因素使他人变得兴奋或感情冲动，多用被动态。
通常指鼓起勇气，充满信心和希望。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 鼓励的；令人鼓舞的；促进的；奖励的；赞助的
adj. 受到鼓舞的；信心倍增的

word_family.mean: v. 激励；鼓舞；鼓励；支持；激发；促进；助长

sense_info_list.en: give support, confidence or hope to

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>encourage</highlight> children to watch, imagine and create their own works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们鼓励孩子们观察、想象以及创作自己的作品。

examination_example.sentence: The Chinese government is <highlight>encouraging</highlight> people to do waste sorting (分类).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国政府鼓励人们进行垃圾分类。

examination_example.sentence: Every time I want to give up, my parents always <highlight>encourage</highlight>（鼓励）me to keep trying．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次想放弃的时候，父母总是鼓励我继续努力。

sense_info_list.en: help or stimulate an activity, state, or view to develop

examination_example.sentence: Garbage-sorting (垃圾分类) <highlight>encourages</highlight> people to live a greener life than before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 垃圾分类使得人们过上比以前更环保的生活。

examination_example.sentence: Free entry does not attract people or <highlight>encourage</highlight> them to appreciate art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 免费入场并不能吸引人们或促使他们欣赏艺术。

examination_example.sentence: The two shows are <highlight>encouraging</highlight> people to love traditional culture and find the beauty of life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这两个节目促使人们热爱传统文化，发现生活的美好。

word_usage.usage: encourage作动词，表示“鼓励”，“鼓励某人做某事”用“encourage sb. to do sth.”，没有“encourage sb. doing sth.”的用法，“encourage doing sth.”表示“鼓励做某事”。
